        <div class="usa-media_block-body">

      <h1 class="heading-level-2 homepage-heading">Access and manage your VA benefits and health care</h1>

          </ul>
        </div>

      <div class="usa-grid usa-grid-full homepage-benefits-row">
        <div class="usa-width-one-third">
          <h3 class="heading-level-4"><a href="/service-member-benefits/" id="zpfkcqse"><i class="icon-small icon-heading hub-icon-service-member hub-background-service-member white"></i>Service member benefits</a></h3>
          <p class="homepage-benefits-description">Find out what benefits you may be eligible for during service and which time-sensitive benefits to consider when separating or retiring.</p>
        </div>
              <div class="usa-width-one-third">
          <h3 class="heading-level-4"><a href="/family-member-benefits/" id="mdeuhbmke"><i class="icon-small icon-heading hub-icon-family-member hub-background-family-member white"></i>Family member benefits</a></h3>
          <p class="homepage-benefits-description">Learn about the benefits you may qualify for as a spouse, dependent, or survivor. And find out what you're eligible for as a family member caring for a Veteran with disabilities.</p>
        </div>
              <div class="usa-width-one-third">
          <h3 class="heading-level-4"><a href="/burials-memorials/" id="duxmnnpea"><i class="icon-small icon-heading hub-icon-burials hub-background-burials white"></i>Burials and memorials</a></h3>
          <p class="homepage-benefits-description">Get help planning a burial in a VA national cemetery, order a headstone or other memorial item to honor a Veteran's service, and apply for survivor and dependent benefits.</p>
        </div>
        </div>
        <div class="usa-grid usa-grid-full homepage-benefits-row">
              <div class="usa-width-one-third">
          <h3 class="heading-level-4"><a href="/careers-employment/" id="wsaqlvm"><i class="icon-small icon-heading hub-icon-careers hub-background-careers white"></i>Careers and employment</a></h3>
          <p class="homepage-benefits-description">Apply for vocational rehabilitation services, get support for your Veteran-owned small business, and access other career resources.</p>
        </div>
              <div class="usa-width-one-third">
          <h3 class="heading-level-4"><a href="/housing-assistance/" id="kakl"><i class="icon-small icon-heading hub-icon-housing hub-background-housing white"></i>Housing assistance</a></h3>
          <p class="homepage-benefits-description">Find out if you're eligible for a VA-backed home loan. If you have a service-connected disability, see if you qualify for a housing grant to help you live more independently.</p>
        </div>
              <div class="usa-width-one-third">
          <h3 class="heading-level-4"><a href="/pension/" id="ftsrewesa"><i class="icon-small icon-heading hub-icon-pension hub-background-pension white"></i>Pension</a></h3>
          <p class="homepage-benefits-description">Apply for monthly payments for wartime Veterans and survivors with limited or no income who meet certain age and disability requirements.</p>
        </div>
        </div>
        <div class="usa-grid usa-grid-full homepage-benefits-row">
              <div class="usa-width-one-third">
          <h3 class="heading-level-4"><a href="/life-insurance/" id="lcvzuvadd"><i class="icon-small icon-heading hub-icon-life-insurance hub-background-life-insurance white"></i>Life insurance</a></h3>
          <p class="homepage-benefits-description">Explore VA life insurance options for Veterans, service members, and families. Manage your policy online, file claims for benefits, and access helpful resources.</p>
        </div>
              <div class="usa-width-one-third">
          <h3 class="heading-level-4"><a href="/education/" id="tvtxxpnx"><i class="icon-small icon-heading hub-icon-education hub-background-education white"></i>Education and training</a></h3>
          <p class="homepage-benefits-description">Apply for and manage your GI Bill and other education benefits to help pay for college and training programs.</p>
        </div>
              <div class="usa-width-one-third">
          <h3 class="heading-level-4"><a href="/records/" id="ecfucscgsw"><i class="icon-small icon-heading hub-icon-records hub-background-records white"></i>Records</a></h3>
          <p class="homepage-benefits-description">Apply for a printed Veteran ID card, get your VA benefit letters and medical records, and learn how to apply for a discharge upgrade.</p>
        </div>
        </div>
        <div class="usa-grid usa-grid-full homepage-benefits-row">
              <div class="usa-width-one-third">
          <h3 class="heading-level-4"><a href="/health-care/" id="fieprdsc"><i class="icon-small icon-heading hub-icon-health-care hub-background-health-care white"></i>Health care</a></h3>
          <p class="homepage-benefits-description">Apply for VA health care, find out how to access services, and manage your health and benefits online.</p>
        </div>
              <div class="usa-width-one-third">
          <h3 class="heading-level-4"><a href="/disability/" id="tksyhfsqm"><i class="icon-small icon-heading hub-icon-disability hub-background-disability white"></i>Disability</a></h3>
          <p class="homepage-benefits-description">File a claim for disability compensation for conditions related to your military service, and manage your benefits over time.</p>
        </div>
            </div>
    </section>

    <section id="homepage-popular">
      <div class="usa-grid usa-grid-full">
        <div class="usa-width-one-third">
          <a href="/find-locations/" class="homepage-button" id="qqnltowhdq">
            <div class="icon-wrapper">
              <i class="fa fa-map-marker-alt homepage-button-icon"></i>
            </div>
            <!-- div required for alignment -->
            <div class="button-inner">
              <span>Find a VA health facility, benefit office, or cemetery</span>
            </div>
          </a>
        </div>

        <div class="usa-width-one-third">
          <button class="homepage-button vcl va-overlay-trigger" data-show="#modal-crisisline" id="hayoxg">
            <div class="icon-wrapper vcl"></div>
            <div class="button-inner">
              <span>Talk to a Veterans Crisis Line responder now</span>
            </div>
          </button>
        </div>

        <div class="usa-width-one-third" id="myva-login">
          <button class="homepage-button signin-signup-modal-trigger" id="lasahi">
            <div class="icon-wrapper">
              <i class="fas fa-user-circle homepage-button-icon"></i>
            </div>
            <div class="button-inner">
              <span>Sign in or create an account to use more tools</span>
            </div>
          </button>
        </div>

      </div>
    </section>

    <!-- end triple column -->

   <!-- end #content -->

  <section class="usa-grid usa-grid-full">
    <div class="va-h-ruled--stars"></div>
  </section>


  <section id="homepage-news">

    <div class="usa-grid usa-grid-full">
      <div class="usa-width-one-third homepage-news-story">
        <div class="homepage-image-wrapper">
          <img class="lazy" width="552" data-src="https://prod-va-gov-assets.s3-us-gov-west-1.amazonaws.com/img/homepage/hp-img-secva-graphic.jpg" alt="Video of VA Secretary Robert Wilkie's video announcing the new VA.gov.">
        </div>
        <h4 class="homepage-news-story-title"><a class="no-external-icon" href="https://youtu.be/DEfRlL63nCg" id="kghtdrj" target="_blank" rel="noopener ">Welcome to the new VA.gov!</a></h4>
        <p class="homepage-news-story-desc">VA Secretary Robert Wilkie talks about the redesign intentionally built with Veterans, for Veterans.</p>
      </div>
          <div class="usa-width-one-third homepage-news-story">
        <div class="homepage-image-wrapper">
          <img class="lazy" width="552" data-src="https://prod-va-gov-assets.s3-us-gov-west-1.amazonaws.com/img/homepage/battle_iwo_jima1.jpg" alt="Graphic of Iwo Jima Veteran Woody Williams.">
        </div>
        <h4 class="homepage-news-story-title"><a class="no-external-icon" href="https://www.blogs.va.gov/VAntage/58427/woody-williams-remembers-the-battle-of-iwo-jima/" id="lonzcokjj" target="_blank" rel="noopener ">74th Anniversary of Iwo Jima</a></h4>
        <p class="homepage-news-story-desc">Marine Corps Veteran Woody Williams shares his story.</p>
      </div>
          <div class="usa-width-one-third homepage-news-story">
        <div class="homepage-image-wrapper">
          <img class="lazy" width="552" data-src="https://prod-va-gov-assets.s3-us-gov-west-1.amazonaws.com/img/homepage/hp-vantage.jpg" alt="Graphic for the VAntage Point">
        </div>
        <h4 class="homepage-news-story-title"><a class="no-external-icon" href="https://www.blogs.va.gov/VAntage/" id="vxsztuf" target="_blank" rel="noopener ">VAntage Point: news you can use</a></h4>
        <p class="homepage-news-story-desc">VAntage Point is VA’s official blog. Here you will find stories from around VA and the Veteran community.</p>
      </div>
        </div>

  </section>

</section></main>

</script>
